TEXT.English: [TAB]The capital seat is the location where the leader of the civ parks his behind and defines the capital of the civilisation before the advent of more permanent structures such as palaces.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Capital Seat[COLOR_REVERT] defines the capital and administrative centre of a civilzation and also provides a small production bonus.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your cities' research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] wonder, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bibliothèques[COLOR_REVERT] améliorent la recherche et produisent de la culture. Elles sont nécessaires pour construire des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]universités[COLOR_REVERT], la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande bibliothèque[COLOR_REVERT], et l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Epopée nationale[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotheken[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und beschleunigen die Forschung spürbar. Darüber hinaus sind sie die Voraussetzung für den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universitäten[COLOR_REVERT], eines Weltwunders ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Große Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT]) und der Nationalen Wunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalepos[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]biblioteche[COLOR_REVERT] aumentano la ricerca e la cultura delle città. Sono necessarie per la realizzazione di [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]università[COLOR_REVERT], della Meraviglia [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] e delle Meraviglia Nazionali [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Poema Patriottico[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotecas[COLOR_REVERT] impulsan la investigación de las ciudades y proporcionan cultura. Son necesarias para construir [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universidades[COLOR_REVERT], la maravilla de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gran Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] y las maravilla nacionales de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Epopeya nacional[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [TAB]The national Slave Auction is a centralized slave sale and distribution center that provides an empire with the means to provide cheap labor to all cities of the empire. Slaves were moved to areas requiring labor which guaranteed that they would never consume resourses without providing a benefit to their owners.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Slave Auction[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free Slave Market in all of your cities and a +1 happiness bonus in the founding city. It increases it's city's odds of generating a Great Merchant.
[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Slave Auction[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] increases slavery infrastrucre nationwide[COLOR_REVERT]!

[TAB]The Slave Market is the local slave auction block in a city where slaves are displayed prior to sale. Nearly all ancient civilizations were built on slave labour and slavery existed even in modern times despite attempts to stamp it out. The slave market was a source of cheap labor and civic pride, as defeated rivals and captured enemies were often displayed for the amusement of the city's citizens prior to begining their labours to build up the very civilizations they opposed.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Slave Market[COLOR_REVERT] provides a 25% production bonus and a +1 happiness bonus in any city it is built in. Allows for the purchase of slaves. Doubles Production for leaders with Organized or Industrius traits.

The use of stone weapons is not limited to man, but was one of the first stages in mans progression to more advanced tool use that enabled him to survive in hostile climates and live alongside and defeat creatures that are stronger, faster or both than himself.
Build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stone Weapons Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] to increase the abilities of your Stone Age Military Units.
